div.div: Sul Ross St. vs. Wayland Baptist
at Plainview, Texas | GS Mem. Bulldog Stad

tr.td: WBU wins toss, elects to receive; SRSU to defend north goal
Adam Cruz kickoff 64 yards to the WBU01, B. Sheppard return 37 yards to the WBU38 (Edgar Hinojosa).
J. Peterson rush for 3 yards to the WBU41 (Zack Roberson).
Payson Bain pass complete to J. Peterson for loss of 4 yards to the WBU37 (Mike Quinonez).
Payson Bain pass incomplete to Trey Rowe.
Caleb O'Connor punt 35 yards to the SRSU28, Wesley Moss return 4 yards to the SRSU32 (Dalton Bartel; Jeremiah Eaton).
